context: What age is this game best suitable for? I have a 5 and 4yr old and was wondering if this is a game they could play.
response: If they can handle the controller(s) with no issues they probably will do ok. They do however need to be able to follow directions to complete the tasks in order to finish each level. If someone was able to help them with that I'm sure they would enjoy it. :)
